resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104400</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104400</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206107</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Windows to the Universe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Windows zum Universum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Windows à l'univers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Windows ao universo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Windows all'universo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Ωηνδοως στον κόσμο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Windows al universo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">explores the Earth, planets of our solar system, and the universe. It includes images, animations, and data sets, and information about books, movies, scientists, and myths.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erforscht die Masse, die Planeten unseres 
Solarsystems und das Universum. Es schließt Bilder, Animationen
und Dateien und Informationen über Bücher, Filme, Wissenschaftler 
und Mythen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">explore la terre, les planètes de notre système
solaire, et l'univers. Il inclut des images, des animations, et 
des Modem, et des informations sur des livres, des films, des 
scientifiques, et des mythes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">explora a terra, planetas de nosso sistema solar,
e o universo. Inclui imagens, animations, e séries de dados de,
e informação sobre livros, filmes, cientistas, e mitos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esplora la terra, i pianeti del nostro sistema 
solare e l'universo. Include le immagini, animazioni ed insiemi 
di dati e le informazioni sui libri, sui film, sugli scienziati
e sui miti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξερευνά τη γη, πλανήτες του ηλιακού συστήματός μας, 
και του κόσμου. Περιλαμβάνει τις εικόνες, τις ζωτικότητες, 
και τα σύνολα στοιχείων, και τις πληροφορίες για τα βιβλία, τους 
κινηματογράφους, τους επιστήμονες, και τους μύθους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">explora la tierra, los planetas de nuestra 
Sistema Solar, y el universo. Incluye imágenes, las 
animaciones, y los modems, e información sobre los libros, las 
películas, los científicos, y los mitos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206107</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104400</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/windows-to-the-universe</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
